content.question: Which of the following free-body diagrams shows the force or forces exerted on the cart at point <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The figure presents a force diagram, and consists of one arrow extending from a point. The arrow points horizontally to the right and is labeled F sub Centripetal.
The figure presents a force diagram, and consists of one arrow extending from a point. The arrow points downward and to the right, and is labeled F sub Net.

The figure presents a force diagram, and consists of two arrows extending from a point. The first arrow points horizontally to the right, and is labeled F sub Centripetal. The second arrow points vertically downward, and is labeled F sub Gravity. The second arrow is much shorter than the first arrow.

The figure presents a force diagram, and consists of two arrows extending from a point. The first arrow points horizontally to the right, and is labeled F sub Normal. The second arrow points vertically downward, and is labeled F sub Gravity. The second arrow is much shorter than the first arrow.

content.answer: The figure presents a force diagram, and consists of two arrows extending from a point. The first arrow points horizontally to the right, and is labeled F sub Normal. The second arrow points vertically downward, and is labeled F sub Gravity. The second arrow is much shorter than the first arrow.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
